name: 100 Bitcoins
description:
Test your reaction speed in this simple but addicting app. Strategically dump the falling bitcoins into your cups, but don't leave any cup unfilled or you'll lose it! Cups that you do fill with coins loop back to you to keep advancing in the game. Don't drop the ball! Focus on the colored and shaded coins for bonus points and enjoy the real rolling and bouncing physics in this fun new app. [All Ages]

******************************************

• Price: Free for a limited time, then $.99
• Universal Compatibility: iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch. Requires iOS 5.0 or later
• HD graphics and custom music

Please leave us a review or send feedback for improvement through our support site. Thanks,

Mobixia
